1237.name: ER 80S-B2 Tig
1237.Applications: Filler metal for high temperature creep resistant 1.25%Cr0.5%Mo ferritic steel. These steels are used for creep resisting applications up to ~550°C. Typical applications in power generation plant include steam piping, turbines and boilers; the alloy also finds applications in the chemical and petro-chemical industries.
1237.Suitable_For: For matching 1.25%Cr0.5%Mo creep resisting ferritic steels. 13CrMo 4-5, 16CrMo 4-4, GS-17CrMo 5-5, ASTM: A182 grades F11/F12, A199/A200 T11, A217 grades WC6/WC11, A234 grades WP11/WP12, A335 grades P11/P12, A387 grades 11/12
